result.execSummary:
The defendant Kiejaun M. Richardson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Absolute sobriety from controlled substances unless prescribed and only within prescribed amounts.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office. 

Assessments/Treatment/Counseling as recommended.

AODA and follow up.

DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Case Called: 10:48 am
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Natasha VanLieshout in person;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

PLEA: 
Ct. 1 (Possession of Cocaine/Coca)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding. Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
Ct. 1 (Possession of Cocaine/Coca)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, AODA and Follow up, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 2 Days Credit.

Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>  Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety from Controlled Substances unless prescribed and only within the prescribed amounts, AODA and Follow up, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 2 Days Credit.
